update business_device_basic

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select b.* from business_device_basic b JOIN business_visit v ON b.business_visit_id = v.id where b.channel_info_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and proxy_mode = 0 and work_state = 3
